channel.title: How Do I Get Real Followers?
channel.description: I don’t have many followers on SoundCloud but I don’t mind since I only just got it this month but so far almost all of my followers are either Auxy people or accounts that only repost (and they obviously just want you to follow them and stuff) Does anyone have tips on how to get real followers? I’d like to grow outside of reposters.
